import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ForgotPasswordView = ({ step, username, newPassword, confirmPassword, error, message, isLoading, setUsername, setNewPassword, setConfirmPassword, handleVerifyUsername, handleResetPassword, resetProcess }) => { return (

{step === 1 ? 'Reset Password' : 'Set New Password'}

{error &&
{error}
} {message &&
{message}
} {step === 1 ? (

Enter your username to find your account and reset your password.

setUsername(e.target.value)} required autoComplete="username" />
) : (

Set a new password for user: {username}

setNewPassword(e.target.value)} required autoComplete="new-password" />
setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)} required autoComplete="new-password" />
)}

Remember your password? Log In

Need an account? Sign Up

); }; export default ForgotPasswordView;
